Name: The Salvation Army - Australia Eastern Territory

About.Officer in charge: Envoy George Hazell O.F. - Territorial Co-ordinator

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 10am-3pm or by appointment; closed public holidays.

About.Access: Open to the public. Reference assistance available in person or by mail or telephone.

About.Acquisition focus: Interested in acquiring any material pertaining to the Salvation Army.

About.Major holdings: Microfilm copy of The War Cry 1883-1983. Personal records of Brig. Sir Arthur McIlveen. Copy of the Salvation Army Foundation deeds - 1875.

Contact.Enquiries to: Mrs Robyn Edge - Assistant to the Co-ordinator
